1370: Yoel moved to Breestraat.A.27 after marriage.
Got married to Itsburgis at age 30 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Itsburgis, Clara, at age 30.
1371: Had a son with Itsburgis, Winrechus, at age 31.
1373: Had a son with Itsburgis, Everdey, at age 33.
1376: Had a son with Itsburgis, Bartholomeus, at age 36.
1379: Lost son Everdey when Everdey was 7 years old.
1380: Had a son with Itsburgis, Harderico, at age 40.
1382: Had a son with Itsburgis, Arnoud, at age 42.
1383: Had a son with Itsburgis, Swegero, at age 43.
1384: Had a daughter with Itsburgis, Marisseis, at age 44.
1385: Had a son with Itsburgis, Marcilius, at age 45.
